tests.name: Average Altitude
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Average_Altitude ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o avgALT fileName &>> __autograding/Average_Altitude/expected ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o avgALT fileName &>>  __autograding/Average_Altitude/output

tests.name: Max Altitude
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Max_Altitude ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o maxALT fileName &>> __autograding/Max_Altitude/expected ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o maxALT fileName &>>  __autograding/Max_Altitude/output
